resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constitutional Issues: Separation of Powers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstitutionelle Ausgaben: Trennung von 
Energien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Issues Constitutionnelles : Séparation des 
puissances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Edições Constitutional: Separação das 
potências</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Edizioni Costituzionali: Separazione delle 
potenzi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνταγματικά ζητήματα: Χωρισμός των δυνάμεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ediciones Constitucionales: Separación de 
potencias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores the important Constitutional mechanism providing for the separation of powers of government among three branches so that each branch checks the other two. Lesson plans use the New Deal to help teach this concept.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht die wichtige konstitutionelle Einheit, 
die für die Trennung von Energien der Regierung unter drei Zweigen 
bereitstellt, damit jeder Zweig die anderen zwei überprüft. 
Lektionpläne verwenden das neue Abkommen, um zu helfen, dieses 
Konzept zu unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore le mécanisme constitutionnel important 
prévoyant la séparation des puissances du gouvernement parmi trois 
branchements de sorte que chaque branchement contrôle les autres 
deux. Les plans de leçon emploient la nouvelle affaire pour 
aider à enseigner ce concept.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora o mecanismo constitutional importante que 
fornece para a separação das potências do governo entre três 
filiais de modo que cada filial verifique os outros dois. As 
plantas da lição usam o negócio novo ajudar ensinar este conceito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora il meccanismo costituzionale importante 
che prevede la separazione delle potenzi del governo fra tre rami in 
modo che ogni ramo controlli gli altri due. I programmi di 
lezione usano il nuovo affare per contribuire ad insegnare questo 
concetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά το σημαντικό συνταγματικό μηχανισμό που 
προβλέπει το χωρισμό των αρμοδιοτήτων της κυβέρνησης μεταξύ 
τριών κλάδων έτσι ώστε κάθε κλάδος ελέγχει άλλους τους δύο. 
Τα σχέδια μαθήματος χρησιμοποιούν τη νέα διαπραγμάτευση για
να βοηθήσουν να διδάξουν αυτήν την έννοια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora el mecanismo constitucional importante que
preve la separación de potencias del gobierno entre tres 
ramificaciones de modo que cada ramificación controle los otros dos. 
Los planes de la lección utilizan el nuevo reparto para ayudar 
a enseñar este concepto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105075</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/constitutional-issues-separation-of-powers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
